meanings.definition: A choice or decision made before an event or situation occurs.
meanings.sent1: I made my preoptions for dinner before going to the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: She carefully considered her preoptions before making a final decision.
meanings.sent3: His preoptions for the movie night were so predictable!
meanings.sent4: Having preoptions is like having a secret weapon in decision-making.
meanings.sent5: The concept of preoptions can help reduce stress in uncertain situations.

meanings.definition: To choose or decide in advance.
meanings.sent1: We need to preoptions our outfits for the trip tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: He always preoptions his meals for the week on Sundays.
meanings.sent3: I preoptionsed my dessert before even looking at the menu!
meanings.sent4: She preoptionsed her path to success with determination.
meanings.sent5: Preoptionsing your actions can lead to better time management.
